Package de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr

This package provides the interface for all the tasks dealing with PerformanceMeasurement.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BARTRunner This class extracts the CoreferencePairs extracted by BART.
Evaluation This class handles the comparison and evaluation of acr outputs according to a given Gold Standard.
JavaRapRunner This class parses JavaRap results gathered during preprocessing and converts the results into CoreferencePairs.
LingpipeRunner Implementation of the LingPipe coreference algorithm.
PerformanceMeasurementMain This class handles the whole process of Feature Dependent Performance Measurement.
Runner Blueprint for classes which run an acr system.
 

Enum Summary
Evaluation.Mode Specifies the evaluation mode to be used.
 

Package de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr Description

This package provides the interface for all the tasks dealing with PerformanceMeasurement.

Classes involved
  • The whole process is executed and monitored by PerformanceMeasurementMain.
  • The Runner.java-Interface defines methods which should be provided by each runner class (e.g. for each system).
  • Each system is represented by one class (e.g. JavaRapRunner, LingpipeRunner and BARTRunner).
    The runner classes know how to run the system on a specified input file and how to extract the results.
  • Evaluation.java will evaluate the results and compare them to the gold standard.
